Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with direct dial phone, satellite TV, safety box. Other facilities: Swimming pool for children, beach bar "Ammos", billiards.

Hotel is located on the left side of the Mikros Gialos bay with its beach, just below the village of Poros, at a distance of 26 km from the capital of Lefkada (Lefkas),7 km from the cosmopolitan town of Nidri, 10km from Syvota and 20km from Vassiliki.
